The presence of two different images sha: one showing an injured elderly man and another showing an old man pelting a stone.
The identification of the individuals in: with one being Maulana Asad Raza Hussaini and the other being an unidentified man during a protest in Kanpur.
The verification of the dates associated: with one image being taken on December 21 during a protest in Kanpur and the other image of Maulana Asad Raza Hussaini being taken on December 24 after he was beaten by the police.
The confirmation from Alt News: a fact-checking organization, that the two men in the images are not the same person as suggested on social media.
